name: dogenado-circuits
description: ZK Circuits for Dogenado Privacy Pool

scripts.setup: npx snarkjs groth16 setup build/withdraw.r1cs pot16_final.ptau build/withdraw_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: npx snarkjs zkey contribute build/withdraw_0000.zkey build/withdraw_final.zkey --name="Dogenado" -v -e="random entropy"
scripts.export:vkey: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/withdraw_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export:verifier: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/withdraw_final.zkey ../contracts/src/Verifier.sol
scripts.prove: npx snarkjs groth16 prove build/withdraw_final.zkey build/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: npx snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
